short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twist fruits and vegetables, they are like spinners

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instead of the usual spinner, twist the vegetables and fruits. If you are tired, take a break, rest and turn the fruit spinners

To enable tools, click the extension icon in the upper-right corner of the browser.
